title: Happy New Year: How To Cure Your Hangover
itunes:title: Happy New Year: How To Cure Your Hangover
description:
Happy New Year, everybody. If you drank too much last night, these cure alls might do the trick!

Fred Minnick's Scientific American Hangover Story: https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/in-search-of-a-cure-for-the-dreaded-hangover/

Fred Minnick's Top 100 Whiskeys of the Year: https://www.fredminnick.com/2021/12/30/best-american-whiskeys-of-2021/
